title: What are easy tips for writing a book of narratives? - Quora

response.answer_text: Please allow me to disabuse you of a common belief: writing a book about anything is not easy. Your book of narratives (whatever that is) won’t be easy, either. No one can give you ‘tips’ to make it easy. You just have to sit down and write the damn thing. If you don’t believe me, take a book off your shelf and type it. Front to back, the whole thing. See how long it takes you. And remember, doing this, that all the decisions have already been made for you. However long it took you to type this book, it will take you 5–15 times as long making the decisions for yourself for your own book. There’s no easy way.
